description: The Wind Shield Pants offer lightweight, soft-shell protection during high-aerobic, cold-weather activities while still allowing you to shed excess heat and moisture through strategically placed breathable panels. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Wind Shield Pants - Mens

specs.value: 4.2-oz 100% polyester (50% recycled) interlock-knit face bonded to a Capilene® Cool Lightweight 100% polyester (50% recycled) back; face has a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
6.8-oz 68% recycled nylon, 15% polyester, 17% spandex jersey with a microterry back and fOur-way stretch
